Articles.Content:
Can someone explain this to me? I've had this happen 3 times now. I can't control my the craft because it randomly thinks there is no electricity (except for some reason Z works with no electricity even though Shift doesn't) and if I revert, my only option, I am stuck in the VAB with no control.

https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/9097777/output_log.zip

- - - Updated - - -

Well, I found an update to RealChute, that might have been the cause. I'll let you know.

- - - Updated - - -

Nope, problem was not RealChute. Same problem, happened again.

Edited January 31, 2015 by Alshain
